articles.description: Despite missing out on the 2024 Ballon d'Or, fans of Vinicius Jr believe it is only ever going to be a matter of when, not if.

articles.description: Ayrton Senna, Michael Schumacher, Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen have all mastered treacherous conditions to win F1 races - but which was the best?
articles.title: After Max Verstappen's Sao Paulo victory, which was the greatest F1 wet-weather drive?

articles.description: Jose Mourinho condemns refereeing standards in Turkey as his Fenerbahce side score deep into stoppage time to beat Trabzonspor.

articles.description: Football in Spain should have been suspended after the flash floods that killed more than 215 people in the Valencia region, says Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti.
articles.title: Spain floods: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti says games should have been postponed

articles.description: England's two-point defeat by New Zealand on Saturday should not be considered George Ford's fault, says Marcus Smith.
articles.title: Marcus Smith: England defeat by New Zealand not all down to George Ford

articles.description: Arsenal sporting director and former player Edu is to leave his role at the London club.
articles.title: Arsenal: Edu to leave role as club's sporting director

articles.description: The Detroit Lions claim a sixth straight win, while Derrick Henry and Lamar Jackson shine for the Baltimore Ravens.
articles.title: NFL results & week 9 round-up: Detroit Lions and Baltimore Ravens win again
